metadata.title: CVE-2023-28642 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: runc is a CLI tool for spawning and running containers according to the OCIspecification. It was found that AppArmor can be bypassed when `/proc`inside the container is symlinked with a specific mount configuration. Thisissue has been fixed in runc version 1.1.5, by prohibiting symlinked`/proc`. See PR #3785 for details. users are advised to upgrade. Usersunable to upgrade should avoid using an untrusted container image.

criterions.comment: runc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
